summary: Spider-Man's movie journey began in 1977 with Marvel owning the rights. In 1999, Sony bought the rights for $7 million and made successful films. Marvel then created its own universe, the MCU, and in 2016, Sony and Disney agreed to include Spider-Man in it. This deal was a big win, with movies making over $2 billion worldwide. Sony also started its own Spider-Man universe (SSU) and partnered with Netflix and Disney for streaming.
title: Spider-Man in film
